com.totsp.gwittir.client.ui.table
Class BoundTable

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
              com.totsp.gwittir.client.ui.AbstractBoundWidget
                  com.totsp.gwittir.client.ui.table.AbstractTableWidget
                      com.totsp.gwittir.client.ui.table.BoundTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesChangeEvents, Bindable, Introspectable, SourcesPropertyChangeEvents, KeyBoundWidget, BoundWidget, HasChunks
Direct Known Subclasses:
OptionTable
public class BoundTable
extends AbstractTableWidget
implements HasChunks

This is an option-rich table for use with objects implementing the Bindable interfaces.

Author:
Robert "kebernet" Cooper
See Also:
Bindable

Field Summary
static int HEADER_MASK
          Renderers a heading row on the table using the labels on the Column objects.
static int INSERT_WIDGET_MASK
          Enables the click in widget insertion.
static int MULTIROWSELECT_MASK
          Lets the user have multiple rows in the "selected" state at a time.
static int NO_NAV_ROW_MASK
          If this table has a DataProvider AND it is not scrolling, this supresses the first, previous, next and last buttons at the bottom of the table.
static int NO_SELECT_CELL_MASK
          Turns off cell selection stying.
static int NO_SELECT_COL_MASK
          Turns off selected column stying.
static int NO_SELECT_ROW_MASK
          Turns off row selection and styling.
static int NONE_MASK
          A placholder for no mask options (0)
static int ROW_HANDLE_MASK
          Determines whether buttons for row handles/selection should be present.
static int SCROLL_MASK
          Renderer the table inside a scroll panel.
static int SORT_MASK
          Enables sorting on the table when a header row is clicked.
static int SPACER_ROW_MASK
          Tells the table to render a spacing row in between bound rows.

Field Detail

NONE_MASK

public static final int NONE_MASK
A placholder for no mask options (0)

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SCROLL_MASK

public static final int SCROLL_MASK
Renderer the table inside a scroll panel.

If the table has a DataProvider, it will use the "Google Reader" get-next-chunk-on-max-scroll operation.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

HEADER_MASK

public static final int HEADER_MASK
Renderers a heading row on the table using the labels on the Column objects.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MULTIROWSELECT_MASK

public static final int MULTIROWSELECT_MASK
Lets the user have multiple rows in the "selected" state at a time.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

public static final int NO_SELECT_ROW_MASK
Turns off row selection and styling.

Constant Field Values

NO_SELECT_CELL_MASK

public static final int NO_SELECT_CELL_MASK
Turns off cell selection stying.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SPACER_ROW_MASK

public static final int SPACER_ROW_MASK
Tells the table to render a spacing row in between bound rows.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

NO_NAV_ROW_MASK

public static final int NO_NAV_ROW_MASK
If this table has a DataProvider AND it is not scrolling, this supresses the first, previous, next and last buttons at the bottom of the table.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SORT_MASK

public static final int SORT_MASK
Enables sorting on the table when a header row is clicked. If this table has a DataProvider, it must be a SortableDataProvider for this to work.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

INSERT_WIDGET_MASK

public static final int INSERT_WIDGET_MASK
Enables the click in widget insertion. Note: This will use the default widget type for the model object from the BoundWidgetTypeFactory

See Also:
BoundWidgetTypeFactory, Constant Field Values

ROW_HANDLE_MASK

public static final int ROW_HANDLE_MASK
Determines whether buttons for row handles/selection should be present.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

public BoundTable(int masks)

Parameters:
masks - int value containing the sum of the *_MASK options for the table.

                  BoundWidgetTypeFactory typeFactory)

sortColumn

public void sortColumn(int index)
Sorts the table based on the value of the property in the specified column index. If using a SortableDataProvider, this will throw a runtime exception if the column denoted by the index is not a supported sortable column.

Parameters:
index - index of the column to sort the table on.
